name: Beastmancer
description: Beastmancer is a monster tamer tactical RPG. Play as an adventurer in a fantasy world, capture monsters and make them fight in turn based battles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Core 2 Duo Processor or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DX11 Compliant DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or 10 64bit Processor: Core i5/i7 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DX11 Compliant with PS 3.0 support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
